Name: Plunderers Adventures: Sea of Whores
About the game: This game simulates a micro tower defense in which you have to protect Annie's and Riley's pirate ship. By moving around four lanes while shooting skills, your goal is to beat the opponents before they reach the girls behind the protagonists. Features Play with 2 powerful girls (a shooter and a buccaneer); Defeat different enemy types; Experience dynamic combat (different types of skills); Get pieces of a narrative and access the whole story through a gallery; Create unique strategies by understating the status system (slow, stun, speed, etc.); Play an endless mode and remove the girls' clothes;
